definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Counterpoised travelling bridge-erecting machine is used for the erection of roads and bridges.
sentences.chinese: 配重行走式架橋機是公路橋樑的架樑設備之一。

sentences.english: It used a lead wire weight at tip . On surface is white PVC Shrink Tubing.
sentences.chinese: 翼尖有鉛條配重，表面蒙乳白色熱縮膜。

sentences.english: Preferably, the balance weight part is provided with a plurality of weight removing holes.
sentences.chinese: 優選的，所述配重部上設置有若干去重孔。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a control system for movable balance weight on three-dimensional electric fork truck.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種三向電動叉車的動配重控制系統。

sentences.english: Ensure that the counter-weights are in balance with the tongs.
sentences.chinese: 確保大鉗平衡配重和鉗子相匹配。

sentences.english: How to know the electrically operated hanging basket's counterweight question?
sentences.chinese: 如何認識電動吊籃的配重問題？

sentences.english: The counterweight iron is one of modern machine manufacture industry foundation crafts.
sentences.chinese: 配重鐵是現代機械製造工業的基礎工藝之一。

sentences.english: A relation between equivalent balancing vector and weight phase angle is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了等效平衡矢量與配重小車相位角的關係式。

definition: dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
lever arm (i.e. perpendicular distance from the fulcrum to the line of force)
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
